name: NiGHTS into Dreams...
synopsis: Immerse yourself in an unparalleled 3D flying experience. NiGHTS truly delivers an amazing virtual world of dreams -- filled with unbelievable real-time effects, fantastic creatures and nightmarish monsters.    * Master a showcase of Sega Saturn's Processing Power. * Face your worst nightmares in a stunning world of 3D gameplay. * Dozens of camera angles, never-seen-before effects and 3D positional sound. * Developed exclusively for Sega Saturn by the creators of "Sonic the Hedgehog."
